summary: Replace  the Unrelenting Force Thuum with Dick Masterson`s "Freedom of Speech" quote.
descriptionHtml:
Pretty self explanatory, replaces one of the game`s main Thuums with the Dick Masterson`s "Freedom of Speech" parrot quote.


[b]To install[/b] simply drag into Wyre Bash`s Installer section, right click and install, or simply unzip directly into the Skyrim Data folder.


I have Dick Masterson`s permission to use his voice in this mod, and can provide proof on request.

I have not tested this mod nearly enough, so let me know if the mod crashes or bugs out.
author: Ruben Albarran
